summary: Implements the client-side representation of the OXABREF DCE/RPC interface, providing data structures, an exception type for RPC session errors, and utility functions for handling referral information such as extracting fully qualified domain names and initializing new directory service agents.
business_intent: Allow software to interact with the Microsoft Exchange address book referral service over DCE/RPC, facilitating lookup of directory references and creation of DSA objects for address book operations.
